name: pixelfin
tagline: A browser-based pixel art editor for creating and exporting pixel graphics
description: Pixelfin is a self-hosted pixel art editor with layer support, palette tools, and export features. Designed for pixel artists, it works directly in the browser without external dependencies.

features.title: Mobile Client
features.description: Browse and interact with federated photo networks on mobile

features.title: Timeline Browsing
features.description: View photo posts in chronological timelines

features.title: Account Support
features.description: Log in using existing federated accounts

features.title: Media Viewing
features.description: View images and captions in a mobile-friendly layout

features.title: Open Client
features.description: Use an open-source client for federated platforms
